testcase.name: Find a product with search bar
testcase.system-out: Given User is on homepage...................................................passed Given User is on search bar.................................................passed When User enter a "fe" in search bar........................................passed And User press on search button.............................................passed Then User should see some results under the searchbar with the word "fe"....passed

testcase.name: Suggestions when entering a product
testcase.system-out: Given User is on homepage...................................................passed Given User is on search bar.................................................passed When User enter a "men" in search bar.......................................passed Then User should see suggestions appear.....................................passed

testcase.name: Not find product
testcase.system-out: Given User is on homepage...................................................passed Given User is on search bar.................................................passed When User enter a "Bbobda" in search bar....................................passed And User press on search button.............................................passed Then User should see message about no result found..........................passed

testcase.name: Login as subscribed user
